meanings.definition: Of or relating to the stars.
meanings.sent1: The astronomer studied the astral bodies in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The children gazed at the astral constellations with wonder.
meanings.sent3: The cat imagined catching an astral star to play with.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like astral diamonds in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut's dream was to explore the astral mysteries of the universe.

meanings.definition: Relating to a supposed nonphysical realm of existence beyond the physical universe.
meanings.sent1: She believed in astral projection and out-of-body experiences.
meanings.sent2: The mystic claimed to have visited the astral plane during meditation.
meanings.sent3: The ghost tried to scare people by pretending to be an astral being.
meanings.sent4: His mind wandered into the astral realm of dreams and fantasies.
meanings.sent5: The psychic claimed to see visions from the astral world beyond.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of the stars.
meanings.sent1: Her dress shimmered with an astral glow under the lights.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a picture of an astral nebula in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The cake decorator created an astral-themed cake for the party.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the sky with astral patterns and colors.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's movements were graceful and fluid, like an astral ballet.
